job_title: Finance Administration Assistant for Tax Department
job_description: Finance Administration Assistant for Tax Department Dell Technologies is a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation, so our Tax team has a huge task in ensuring that we meet our tax obligations. It’s a wide-ranging area – from tax research, planning and compliance, through to developing and implementing systems to support data collection, analysis, preparation and submission. Whether preparing and completing tax returns and reports, catching up with the latest developments in tax law or answering enquiries from a host of internal and external customers, we’re always switched on and on top of our game. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Tax Administrative Assistant on our Corporate Income Tax Team in Bratislava, Slovakia. You will: To proactively organize departmental meetings/conference calls as required, such as; Monthly/Quarterly Team/People Manager meetings, Training sessions, 1:1s, Team Building events etc. Team budget maintenance, purchase order management and quarterly budget reviews To attend meetings and conferences to furnish information, take notes, and monitor action items Act as a resource on departmental policies and procedures & to collect, analyze, and prepare data for meetings and conferences To update and maintain the accuracy of all records and files, as required by the team e.g. collection of statutory tax documents from local entities for storing on Company tax database Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Finance university degree or finance experience/personal assistant experience Excellent knowledge of general office procedures Business English, spelling, and punctuation Excellent organizational skills Ability to work proactively ​ Salary starting from: 1 200 EUR gross/month Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.
